name: Valkyrie Nemesis
description:
Travel the vast dark dungeon, gathering warrior souls to help your kingdom. Optimize the character's skill system to face the numerous and fierce monsters lurking everywhere. Collect rare equipment, build unique characters with a large database of hundred skills and equipments.

Play as Patricia - a Keres, who collects the souls of fallen warriors. On the orders of the queen of the underworld, Hel, she travels to Midgard - the human world, in an attempt to keep the balance of forces over Asgard. During the course of her mission, Patricia encountered many strange stories, many types of demons or strange monsters that even in hell had never been seen.

Key Features

- Rich battle system

- Hundreds of skills & equipments for you to freely customize your characters
